Name: NY HEAT Act. (S.2016-A/A.4592-A)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S.2016-A/A.4592-A, also known as the NY HEAT Act, which would align utility regulation with state climate justice and emission reduction targets and repeal certain provisions of the Public Service Law relating to gas service and sale
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
